name: Fix Failing Tests
description: Identify and fix all failing tests in the project
prompt:
Fix all failing tests using this systematic approach:

1. Run `go vet ./...` first to catch compilation errors
2. Run `make test` to identify failing tests
3. For each failing test:
   - Read the error message and stack trace
   - Examine the test code and implementation
   - Fix incrementally (don't rewrite everything)
   - Run the specific test: `go test -v ./path -run TestName`
   - Verify it passes before moving to the next

4. After all fixes, run `make test` to ensure no regressions

Provide a summary of tests fixed and any remaining issues.
